mapper.insert: insert into member (email, password, nickname, language, birth, sex, hobby) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{language}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{hobby})
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
select count(*) from member where nickname = #{nickname}
select m.email, password, nickname, language, birth, sex, hobby, m.intro, m.profile, auth from member m left outer join auth a on m.email = a.email where m.email = #{email}
select m.email, password, nickname, language, birth, sex, hobby, m.intro, m.profile, auth from member m left outer join auth a on m.email = a.email where m.nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY dbms_random.value)
mapper.update: update member set profile=#{profile} where nickname=#{nickname}
